config.text: Demolition and Stabilization Tracker
Demolition and Stabilization Tracker

Welcome to the Demo Tracker by the Demolition Department! Discover information about demolitions and stabilizations happening near a specific address and its vicinity.


  • If you're unsure of the address, you can utilize these search methods:
  • Select "Find address or place" in the search box or click anywhere on the map.
  • Use Area the button to navigate to specific districts or neighborhoods.
  • To minimize the demo progress on the map, click the Type button to deselect them individually.
